Title: Fifth Challenge of Tyr: Ingenuity
Description:
As this was not how the Power Core was supposed to be obtained, it requires a re-attunement to the energies of the Engine. The resonance frequencies of the denizens of Tyrhold should bring the core to its full potential once more.

Though I do not wish to sacrifice more of my brethren, I believe this is the only way this challenge may be completed.
ObjectivesText: Attune Irideus' Power core with titanic energy from Tyrhold.
